name: rotatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to rotation (= movement in a circle around a fixed point): Angular momentum is a measure of the amount of rotatory motion in a system. The sample was treated in a rotatory mixer for two hours.
More examplesFewer examplesPart of Copernicus's theory is that all spherical planetary bodies display rotatory motion.You can review the available options and select the one you want using a rotatory dial.She suffered some rotatory instability in her right knee following the accident.
